Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Ostrich AvBD2 (Ostrich avian beta defensin 2, Ostricacin-1, OSP-1, UCSS1a; natural AMPs; birds, animals; BBL; 3S=S)

Literature Information.Literature: Re-named based on the recommendation (Lynn DJ et al 2007 Immunol Lett 110:86-89). Dilsulfide bonds: 3,29; 8,23; and 13,30.   Active against S. aureus 1056 MRSA (MIC 1.25 ug/ml), S. aureus NCTC 4163 (MIC 6.7 ug/ml), E. coli O157:H7 (MIC 0.96 ug/ml), and E. coli 0111 (MIC 6.7 ug/ml). Also active against P. multocida, S. choleraesuis and S. agalactiae (Lu S et al., 2014). Updated 12/2014.
Literature Information.Author: Yu, P.-L, Choudhury SD, Ahrens K 2001
Literature Information.Title: Purification and characterization of the antimicrobial peptide, ostricacin
